code:
def is_prime?(n)
  return false if n < 2
  return true if n == 2
  return false if n.even?
  i = 3
  while i * i <= n
    return false if n % i == 0
    i += 2
  end
  true
end

raw_response:
Thought: Provide a concise Ruby function that determines whether a given integer is prime.
```ruby
def is_prime?(n)
  return false if n < 2
  return true if n == 2
  return false if n.even?
  i = 3
  while i * i <= n
    return false if n % i == 0
    i += 2
  end
  true
end
```
